item.title: 1 year with Jenkins X
item.description: At the DevOps World | Jenkins World 2019 Conference in Lisbon, I gave a talk titled 1 year with Jenkins X. In this talk, I shared our experience using Jenkins X at Dailymotion for more than 1 year: how we went from the “hello world” to the “real world” with the “most innovative Jenkins X implementation”.
